name: Nyarlathotep, the Crimson Radiance
text:
Limit 1
Awakening W: When this card enters your field ⇒ Remove target resonator from the game.
When this card leaves your field for a non-field zone ⇒ Put that removed card into its owner's field.
Awakening R: When this card enters your field ⇒ You may play a light or fire chant with total cost 3 or less from your hand without pay ing its cost.
At the end of turn ⇒ If there are not limit counters on this card, return it to its owner's hand.
